Sentencas: The influence of iridium on the reactivity of powder mixtures made of perovskites and 8 mol% yttria stabilized zirconia (8 YSZ) is reported.
Titulo: Influence of iridium on the reactivity of LaFeO3 base perovskites

Sentencas: Iridium is added to the perovskites of the composition (La0.6M0.4)(z)Fe0.8TM0.2O3-delta (M = Sr, Ca; TM = Mn, Co; z = 0.90, 1.00) via the gaseous phase.
Titulo: Influence of iridium on the reactivity of LaFeO3 base perovskites

Sentencas: Iridium is present in the perovskite lattice as Ir4+ replacing iron as is evident from XRD and TEM/EDX results.
Titulo: Influence of iridium on the reactivity of LaFeO3 base perovskites

Sentencas: Compatibility studies carried out at 1000 degrees C demonstrate that iridium has considerable influence on the reactivity.
Titulo: Influence of iridium on the reactivity of LaFeO3 base perovskites

Sentencas: The results are discussed with respect to the stability of the perovskites, thermodynamic activities, Ir(IV)-O bonding, tolerance factor and oxygen migration.
Titulo: Influence of iridium on the reactivity of LaFeO3 base perovskites
